reviewText: Absolutely humorous, great movies and a bargin for three for one price. All the movies, not too dated gave me comic relief and enjoyment.

I mainly got this for Outrageous but ruthless people is another good movie I am not much on down and out in beverly hills. It was a good price and it played good.Ruthless People & Down Out Beverly & Outrageous
Love these three movies. Great having them all on 1 dvd. My granddaughter hadn't seen them before and thought they were great.

Great movie.fast moving enjoyable and funny.devitos wife gets kidnapped and he won't pay the ransom and encourages them to kill her.watch it you will enjoy this classic movie over and over.great for family and adults

I was watching old VHS tapes of these three movies and had forgotten how much I loved them. Because of the extremely poor quality of my VHS tapes I got on Amazon to see how much they were.  Imagine my excitement at getting these three outrageously, down and out, and ruthlessly funny movies in a three pack at an extremely great price.  Thank you Amazon for offering this online shopper a variety of items from a variety of sellers.

I love them all but Ruthless People is my favorite! Has me
laughing so hard every time I watch. "xmas at k-mart" classic!
One of Bette's best portrayals Barbara Stone. Only she could
play that character so beautifully!
We can watch these classic comedies over and over again.  Bette Midler and Danny DeVito are at their best in "Ruthless People."  Don't miss this movie classic!!!
I know loving these films might really date me as being in my fifties but I love these movies.  When I am feeling down any of these three will bring a smile to my face.  And this is a great bargain.
Whenever I am feeling ruthless and down and out, I reach for these two movies for the cure; by the end of one or both of these I am dreaming about having an outrageous fortune and, then, all is well.
Comedy Classics!
A+
Great quality DVD and got a lot of bang for my buck
Best comic ever,
great dvd

These are some of my all time favorite 80smovies and to get them on one dvd is awesome. Me, my sister and my mom had a 80s movie weekend.it was fun now I'm having the same night with my co-workers who want to watch them too. Now that there are no longer any movie rental stores around, you can't rent these random movies anymore and they are definitely not at redbox.
just want the one movie  ruthless people great movie love it  only like the outrageous fortunes movie  but hated the down and out beverly hills movie that was s***

These are each well worth watching and having all three in a set sure saves shelf space. Great comedies from some female super stars!

Ready for a lot of laughs? This movie combo pack is loaded with funny films.
These are great to add to your DVD collection. Our "Our Divine Miss M" delivers! If you like these, check out "Parental Guidance" with Bette Midler and Billy Crystal (new to DVD).

I like the dvd triple features with Bette Mildler and the entire cast of the film. This is so great I loved it. No problem with the film. This comes with 3 discs in a dvd case. This film is rated R in all 3 films. I could recommend this to anyone who loves this film.

This dvd compilation made it to me very rapidly. Each disc played flawlessly. Thank you !!!

This DVD has three movies in it with Bette Midler, Ruthless people, Down and Out in Beverly Hills, and Outrageous Fortune.  Funny movies if you like Bette Middle (she can be annoying at times, but so can Shelley Long), it also features Shelly Long, Danny DeVito, Nick Nolte, Richard Dreyfuss, Judge Rienhold, Helen Slater and many more stars.  This is a great value, three DVDs in one (each movie is on a separate disc).
What a bargain! Some great comedy movies all in one package. Fantastic picture quality.
good product and service
